POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tcm.tencentcloudapi.com

X-TC-Action: DeleteMesh
<公共请求参数>

{
    "MeshId": "xx",
    "NeedDeleteCLS": "false",
    "NeedDeleteTMP": "false",
    "NeedDeleteAPM": "false",
    "NeedDeleteGrafana": "false"
}
